pizza.name: Pepperoni
pizza.text: Our award winning pepperoni pizza with our secret signature sauce and topped with roasted pepperonis. This pizza will satisfy your taste buds with every bite!

pizza.name: 3-meat
pizza.text: Want more meat? Try our 3-meat pizza! It has fresh sauage, fresh ham, and of course roasted pepperoni to enhance the robust flavor of our signature sauce.

pizza.name: Supreme
pizza.text: If you like everything on your pizza, then our Supreme is the way to go! It include green peppers, vidalia onions, black olives, tomatoes, spinach and your choice of meat.

pizza.name: Buffalo Chicken
pizza.text: Try our amazing Buffalo Chicken pizza! The great tase of fresh cooked chicken on top of our award winning dough topped with our signature Baffalo sauce.

pizza.name: Flatbread Specialty
pizza.text: When you think healthy but tasty, thnk Flatbread pizza. You get to enjoy a great pizza with fresh veggies and olive oil withouut worrying about those pesky carbs!

pizza.name: Green Olive Special
pizza.text: Try our NEW! Green Olive Special! The taste of our fresh green olives on top of our new green olive sauce and pepperoni is an oral masterpiece!

sandwich.name: Grilled Chicken
sandwich.text: Our Grilled Chicken sandwich is a juicy perfection of flavorful herbs and spices topped with lettuce, tomato, and onion, all wrapped in a toasted bun!

sandwich.name: Fried Chicken
sandwich.text: Just like our Grilled Chicken, this flavorful sandwich adds an extra boost by being deep-fried to order to give it the extra crispyness you desire!

sandwich.name: Buffalo Chicken
sandwich.text: If you like the heat, our Buffalo Chicken gives you exactly what you're looking for! That great fried chicken taste doused in our signature buffalo sauce.

sandwich.name: Chicken Sub
sandwich.text: Try our NEW Chicken Sub! The chciken is marinated for 24 hours in our signature smokey sauce and flame grilled topped with lettuce, tomato and mayo.

sandwich.name: Cheese Burger
sandwich.text: Our Cheese Burger has everything you want. That classic burger flavor topped with lettuce, tomato, pickles, onion all on a toasted bun to perfection!

sandwich.name: Grilled Cheese
sandwich.text: Our Grilled Cheese sandwich has the great taste of an American classic. The crispy toasted bread with that gooey cheesy inside we all desire!

other.name: Salad
other.text: Our Salad is made up of fresh romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, green pepper, cucumber, carrots, and your choice of dressing to go on top!

other.name: Spaghetti
other.text: Our Spaghetti recipe comes striaght from Italy! Our sauce is made fresh from fresh tomatoes and other signature ingredients with fresh made pasta.

other.name: Chicken Wings
other.text: If you just want a classic American dish, then try our Chicken Wings! 10 wings fried to order and doused in your choice of sauce, you will not be disapointed!

other.name: Fish Strips
other.text: Fish Strips are our taste of the sea! Enjoy 3 fresh fried tilapia strips that just melt like butter in your mouth as soon as you bite down.

other.name: Chicken Alfredo
other.text: Our Chicken ALfredo is a must try! Our signature alfredo recipe is like no other and combined with fresh made pasta, you will be back for more!

other.name: Sirloin Steak
other.text: Our 6 oz Sirloin Steak comes from the best prime choice cut and is made to order! From well done to rare it always comes out perfect!
